text:
Pyotr Petrovitch sat across from Sonia. He looked serious. 

“Will you make my excuses to your mother?” he asked. 

Sonia felt shy. “Yes, I’ll tell her at once.” 

She jumped up, eager to leave. 

“Wait,” he smiled, stopping her. “I have another reason for coming.” 

Sonia sat back down, curious. 

Her eyes flicked to the money on the table. 

Pyotr Petrovitch noticed her gaze. 

“I need to discuss something important,” he said, his tone shifting. 

Sonia's heart raced.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Pyotr Petrovitch expresses his apologies to Sonia for missing dinner and reveals he has another purpose for their meeting.
